elements.text:
* Player character movement.
* The world infinitely scrolls.
* An enemy spawns.
* Enemy follows player.
* Player takes damage when hit by enemy.
* Player has a weapon that auto-attacks.
* Projectile damages enemy when they collide with enemy.
* Many of the same enemy type spawn.
* Enemies spawn continuously during a wave.
* Enemies drop bottle caps when they die.
* A shop opens up at timed intervals.
* In the shop, weapon options appear.
* Purchase weapon with bottlecaps.
* After purchasing a weapon, the player gets that weapon attack
* If the player already has the weapo purchased, they get to upgrade that weapon
* At the end of 5 minutes, if the player is still alive, they beat the level.

* If player runs out of health, they die
* When the level is over, they go to upgrade screen.
* On upgrade screen, they can purchase attribute upgrades with caps.

* Player character movement.
* The world infinitely scrolls.
* An enemy spawns.
* Enemy follows player.
* Player takes damage when hit by enemy.
* Player has a weapon that auto-attacks.

* Many of the same enemy type spawn.
* Enemies spawn continuously during a wave.
* Enemies drop bottle caps when they die.
* A shop opens up at timed intervals.
* In the shop, weapon options appear.
* Purchase weapon with bottlecaps.
* After purchasing a weapon, the player gets that weapon attack
* If the player already has the weapo purchased, they get to upgrade that weapon
* At the end of 5 minutes, if the player is still alive, they beat the level.

* If player runs out of health, they die
* When the level is over, they go to upgrade screen.
* On upgrade screen, they can purchase attribute upgrades with caps.
